content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Receiving interactions during SD Balancer monitoring Service Desk operator should review and categorize interactions by certain described steps. The correct categorization is important as it influences on the correct request assignment, SLA, etc.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Study '\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/x/zmWQFg\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Categorizing Interactions\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"' and try to follow the described steps while viewing SD Balancer Monitoring with your Curator or another Service Desk operator.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
